Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'This Inver-Device... Tifa took it off herself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It was broadcasting connection requests for Mind Beacons before it was taken off, so it's been like this the whole time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But, what could possibly make a Construct take off their Inver-Device in a place full of the virus?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, I have a bad feeling about this.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'According to the scans, these two Constructs were members of the Suzaku squad!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I think you owe us an explanation. Weren\'t you trying to take down the "Iron Maiden"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Little Tifa is right by our side here, dear.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I never said a thing about her being around that signal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So you said all that to misdirect us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We had to secure our little treat, you know? You all have yourselves to blame—we wouldn't have had to play this little trick if you weren't so efficient on your mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Impeding the mission like this, how are you going to explain to President Hassen?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Compared to the competition within Kurono, that's nothing. You know full well, don't you, Lee?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Alright, you can all continue dawdling around. We're digging in.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If her squad could've handled it on their own, there wouldn't be so many squads sent on this mission.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's start by investigating these two Corrupted Constructs. We'll catch up with them later.", 4: '1'}
